turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about International Underwriting Association.
turn.1: What is the IUA of London?
turn.2: International Underwriting Association The International Underwriting Association (IUA) of London, better known as the IUA, represents companies that trade in the London insurance market outside Lloyd's.
turn.4: They include branches or subsidiaries of nearly all the world's largest international insurance and reinsurance companies.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: The exact size of IUA members’ contribution to the London market is not known.
turn.7: What do you find to be the most interesting fact?
turn.8: They wrote a total of at least £10 billion premium during 2009, a figure that does not include income processed outside the London market bureau.
turn.9: What was their main source of income?
turn.10: This business is wholesale, the bulk being made up of insurance for large multinational companies or reinsurance.
turn.12: Most of it is international, brought into London by brokers.
